announcement:
✔🇵🇰 August vibes are On! Independence Day theme is live! Update the app now to experience the new look. 🇵🇰
✔ Automated class reminders are now active, never miss a class again! 😎
✔ All campuses share a common lost and found portal. Always mention your campus name when creating a listing.
✔ You can now choose your campus from the top app bar for quick access to campus-specific links.
✔ 📢 Verified internships and opportunities are shared ON and OFF, keep notifications ON and share the app! 🎓
